Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery wine-jar, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:30-31 House T.34.2A I.37
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393603) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393603)
